Title: Silverlight Spring Graph
Description:
Silverlight Spring Graph is an open source port of http://mark-shepherd.com/blog/springgraph-flex-component/ Flex Spring Graph.

It displays a set of items that are linked to each other using an organic display and allowing to drag them.
HomeWiki:
Project Description

Silverlight Spring Graph is an open source port of Flex Spring Graph.

It displays a set of items that are linked to each other using an organic display and allowing to drag them.

Check out some demos:
  • Simple examples:.

  • Molecule Viewer:.

  • Twitter Followers Graph:.
